column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " Good to see you again , Abbot Shung . "
#Text=Shung says : " Is there anything you need ?
#Text=" Shung says : " And you must be the honorable Pema !
#Text=This is an ancient airbender head shaver we 've refurbished just for you .
#Text=Now , they can brighten up your room .
#Text=Anything for the mother of the next generation of airbenders .
#Text=" Jinora says : " You do n't even like to read !
#Text=" Pema says : " Yep , those are the world 's next generation of airbenders .
#Text=" Bumi says : " S'cuse me , a little help here ?
#Text=" Acolyte says : " Sorry , I thought you were the servants .
#Text=" Bumi says : " We 're Tenzin 's brother and sister !
#Text=" Acolyte says : " Avatar Aang had other children ?
#Text=The world is filled with more airbenders ?
#Text=" Acolyte says : " Oh ... I 'm so sorry .
